divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking survey pictures of the land around my house and this disc thing, though only for a few seconds was up and around my neighbors orchard. I took a pictue when it was about 600 yards in the air above an irrigation ditch. I thought was a bird diving down,then it went back up and around then down and it looked like a metal aloid like silicon. I felt almost hyptotized.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
Summary: pulsing like a heart beat through the air
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around August 12th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
